metadata.title: CVE-2024-41052 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vfio/pci: Init the count variable in collecting hot-reset devicesThe count variable is used without initialization, it results in mistakesin the device counting and crashes the userspace if the get hot reset infopath is triggered.
